mapper.insert: INSERT INTO status_provider_by_renta ( renta_id, user_id, catalog_status_provider_id, comment, created_at, updated_at, fg_active ) VALUES ( #{renta.rentaId}, #{user.usuarioId}, #{catalogStatusProvider.id}, #{comment}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{fgActive} )
mapper.select: SELECT status.id, renta.id_renta AS renta_id, renta.folio AS renta_folio, usuario.nombre AS usuario_nombre, usuario.apellidos AS usuario_apellidos, catalog.id AS catalog_status_provider_id, catalog.description AS catalog_status_provider_description, status.comment, status.created_at, status.updated_at, status.fg_active FROM status_provider_by_renta status INNER JOIN renta renta ON (renta.id_renta = status.renta_id) INNER JOIN usuarios usuario ON (usuario.id_usuarios = status.user_id) INNER JOIN catalog_status_provider catalog ON (catalog.id = status.catalog_status_provider_id) WHERE status.fg_active = '1' AND status.renta_id = #{rentaId} ORDER BY status.id DESC

SELECT status.id, renta.id_renta AS renta_id, renta.folio AS renta_folio, usuario.nombre AS usuario_nombre, usuario.apellidos AS usuario_apellidos, catalog.id AS catalog_status_provider_id, catalog.description AS catalog_status_provider_description, status.comment, status.created_at, status.updated_at, status.fg_active FROM status_provider_by_renta status INNER JOIN renta renta ON (renta.id_renta = status.renta_id) INNER JOIN usuarios usuario ON (usuario.id_usuarios = status.user_id) INNER JOIN catalog_status_provider catalog ON (catalog.id = status.catalog_status_provider_id) WHERE status.fg_active = '1' AND status.renta_id = #{rentaId} ORDER BY status.id DESC LIMIT 1
